author: Mike Masnick
description: We’re a few weeks into our end of year crowdfunding campaign—donate $100 or more (check out that $230 option!) and we’ll send you our first commemorative challenge coin celebrating 30 years of Section 230. I’ve already laid out why our coverage matters, why we’re not selling out (because we’re not like Bari Weiss), and why […]
title: Techdirt Doesn’t Annoy You Into Paying, And That’s Worth Paying For
